# Brooks Floor Covering

> Brooks Floor Covering is a family-owned professional flooring company serving the Greater Phoenix Area, Arizona since 1994. We provide flooring sales, installation, repairs, concrete services, and specialty tile work for residential and commercial clients. Licensed, bonded, and insured — ROC #226840. Phone: (623) 688-8422. For comprehensive details, see [llms-full.txt](https://brooksfloorcovering.com/llms-full.txt).

Brooks Floor Covering has over 30 years of experience in the floor covering industry. We are known for exceptional quality, honest pricing, and going the extra mile on every project. We partner with industry-leading manufacturers including Mohawk, Shaw, Arizona Tile, Daltile, and others.

## Services

- [Services Overview](https://brooksfloorcovering.com/services): We install hardwood, engineered wood, ceramic tile, natural stone, carpet, carpet tile, and luxury vinyl tile & plank for residential and commercial projects throughout the Greater Phoenix Area. Free in-home estimates available.
- [Carpet Flooring](https://brooksfloorcovering.com/services/carpet): Professional carpet installation including commercial glue-down, carpet tile, and stretch-in carpet with pad. Nylon, PET, wool, and eco-friendly fiber options for residential and commercial spaces.
- [Tile Flooring](https://brooksfloorcovering.com/services/tile): Ceramic, porcelain, and natural stone tile installation for kitchens, bathrooms, entryways, and commercial spaces. Expert layout planning, grouting, and finishing.
- [Luxury Vinyl Plank](https://brooksfloorcovering.com/services/luxury-vinyl-plank): Waterproof, scratch-resistant LVP flooring that replicates the look of natural hardwood. Ideal for kitchens, bathrooms, offices, and high-traffic areas.
- [Engineered Hardwood](https://brooksfloorcovering.com/services/engineered-hardwood): Solid hardwood and engineered wood flooring installation using nail-down, glue-down, and floating methods. Multiple wood species and finish options available.
- [Polished Concrete](https://brooksfloorcovering.com/services/polished-concrete): High-performance polished concrete flooring with customizable sheen levels and aggregate exposure. Suitable for residential, commercial, and industrial spaces.
- [Epoxy Flooring](https://brooksfloorcovering.com/services/epoxy): Seamless epoxy flooring systems including solid color, metallic, quartz, and flake options. Ideal for garages, warehouses, showrooms, and commercial kitchens.
- [Floor Preparation](https://brooksfloorcovering.com/services/floor-preparation): Professional subfloor preparation including concrete grinding, moisture mitigation, self-leveling underlayment, waterproofing, and adhesive removal.
- [Custom Tile Showers](https://brooksfloorcovering.com/services/custom-tile-showers): Fully custom tile shower design and installation with hand-built mud pans, waterproofing systems, built-in benches, niches, and precision tile work.

## Business Segments

- [Commercial Flooring](https://brooksfloorcovering.com/commercial): Commercial flooring services for businesses, property managers, and contractors. On-site evaluations, coordinated scheduling, and installation designed to minimize operational disruption.
- [Residential Flooring](https://brooksfloorcovering.com/residential): Residential flooring services with in-home consultations, expert material guidance, and professional installation. Carpet, hardwood, LVP, tile, and laminate options for every room.
